CustomField.description: Indicates whether Bynder owes 20% of ARR or of only Connector.
CustomField.formula:
/* If Bynder already owes commission (= SFCC Commission field on Account is not blank), user the value on Account. For new orders, Bynder owes 20% of ARR for New Business, and 20% of Connector when Connector is sold as Upsell. */
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.SFCC_Commission__c))), TEXT(Account.SFCC_Commission__c), IF( OR( SFMC_Is_from_Salesforce_Lead__c, SFMC_Is_influenced_by_Salesforce__c, Opportunity__r.of_SFCC_Connector__c > 0 ), IF( AND(CONTAINS(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type), "New Business"),Opportunity__r.of_SFCC_Connector__c > 0), "20% of ARR", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Type, "Existing Business-Upsell"),Opportunity__r.of_SFCC_Connector__c > 0), "20% of Connector",'')),'' ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Whether Bynder owes 20% of ARR or of only Connector.
CustomField.label: SFCC Commission
